meaningMnemonic: If you’ve been walking all day, nobody is going to want to <radical>kiss</radical> your <radical>foot</radical> if you’ve been walking barefoot down a dirt <kanji>road</kanji>. Your feet are filthy, sweaty, and stinky. Nobody is going to want to kiss those feet.
readingMnemonic: What was this person walking down again? Oh, that’s right – a <reading>ro</reading>ad (ろ). They were walking down a dirt <kanji>road</kanji>.
